Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is giving general answers and it's not in context of learning and current events compared to when a teacher explains it. Teachers are also able to pick up on doubts I would have and can check if I understood a concept.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: yes, AI mostly checked the grammar instead of truly "reading" the points.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is faster feedback and more approachable at times. Some teachers can be stand-offish when checking work.
